Articles.Content:
I installed the latest version of OPM (1.8.1) and the latest version of Kopernius (0.5.2), both compatible with 1.0.5. However, all of the gas giants were rendered as plain white balls. Their rings were solid white. To make matters worse, none of the gas giant's moons besides Eeloo even appeared. 

I am running 1.0.5, with all mods compatible.

Mods Using:
MechJeb
KAC
KER
SpaceY Heavy Lifters PAck
SpaceY Extended
TweakScale               
UbioZur Welding
ModuleManager
